title: SCP-CN-3009
content:
[[include :scp-wiki-cn:credit:start]]
**SCP-CN-3009：**遗憾

**作者：**[[*user All things are one]]

感谢[[*user Re_spectators]]、[[*user Dr Hormress]]、[[*user Tengurthy Clotsfoot]]、[[*user A Nameless Creator]]的帮助！
----
图像来源[由[[*user gocgoc]]与[[*user haplocalyx]]]提供：https://picryl.com/media/generating-equipment-lies-beneath-a-section-of-collapsed-roof-in-the-base-power-e0f852  https://pixabay.com/zh/photos/sunrise-sun-cloud-evening-sunshine-4814120/ https://garystockbridge617.getarchive.net/media/views-of-ground-zero-new-york-sept-14-2001-us-82a700 https://pxhere.com/en/photo/1611116 https://www.flickr.com/photos/vintage_illustration/44436772820 

南星变大火，热气余丹霞。

光景不可回，六龙转天车。

荆人泣美玉，鲁叟悲匏瓜。

功业若梦里，抚琴发长嗟。

[[[all-things-are-one-personnel-page |该作者的更多作品]]] 
[[include :scp-wiki-cn:credit:end]]
